text: Tools for automatically generating unit tests for C++?
We have a large amount of legacy C++ code in shared libraries that are used on dozens of products.

Ignoring the pros and cons of automatically generating tests (that's a discussion for another day), does anyone have any recommendations for a tool that would analyse the source and generate a set of tests to exercise that code?
Ideally it would be a Windows tool, Linux might be okay if absolutely necessary.
